text:
How to Scrape Upwork Jobs in 2025 (Now That RSS Feeds Are Gone)
Upwork removed their RSS feeds, making job tracking harder.

But I found a way to automate Upwork job searches. Here’s how 👇

🔹 Step 1: Use Apify for Web Scraping

Apify has a pre-built Upwork job scraper.
You get $5/month in free credits (= 1,250 free job searches).
It’s $4 per 1,000 results after that.
🔹 Step 2: Set Up Keywords in Apify

Choose your search terms (e.g., https://t.co/y91On5I38N, automation, CRM).
You can also scrape multiple searches at once.
Save the scraper settings.
🔹 Step 3: Run the Scraper in https://t.co/y91On5I38N

In https://t.co/y91On5I38N, add an Apify module.
Connect your API key.
Set it to run once a day at 6 AM (so your leads are fresh).
🔹 Step 4: Store Results in Google Sheets

Every new job listing is automatically added to a Google Sheet.
No more wasting time searching manually.
💡 Result?

Daily fresh job leads in your inbox
Instant filtering & scoring of job quality
Less time searching, more time closing deals
Would this help you? Drop a comment 👇

text:
🏹 Prospecting  strategy 1️⃣

1. Know Your Main Audience (TAM):

- Focus on your Total Addressable Market for high-volume campaigns.
- Target areas where you’re most likely to get customers.
- Use tools like Clay, Trigify(.)io, Apify, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Indeed, Apollo(.)io, Crunchbase, G2, Google, Capterra, Semrush, LeadMagic, Ahrefs, and Similarweb.

2. Find Your Competitors’ Customers:

- Identify companies using your competitors' products.
- Show them how your offering is better with comparisons and case studies.
- Use tools like BuiltWith, Store Leads, and G2.

3. Look at Complementary Tech Stacks:

- Find companies that use software which works well with yours.
- Explain how your solution can improve their current setup.
- Use tools like PhantomBuster, BuiltWith, and Store Leads.

4. Target Customer Lookalikes:

- Find companies similar to your best customers.
- Share success stories of similar companies using your service.
- Use tools like Ocean(.)io and Apollo

5. Watch for Intent Signals:

- Catch leads at the right moment by spotting visitors on your website or LinkedIn who already know your brand.
- Enrich their data, qualify them, and start a campaign to engage them.
- Use tools like RB2B, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and Teamfluence™.

What’s your plan for 2025 outbound sales? 🏹
fullText:

1. Know Your Main Audience (TAM):

- Focus on your Total Addressable Market for high-volume campaigns.
- Target areas where you’re most likely to get customers.
- Use tools like Clay, Trigify(.)io, Apify, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Indeed, Apollo(.)io,

text:
You can’t automate anything if you don’t know how to set up API keys.

https://t.co/y91On5I38N, Apify, ChatGPT, and Google Sheets all require API connections.
Mess this up, and your automation won’t work.

Here’s how to set up API keys the right way.

👇 Thread / Post:

1️⃣ What is an API Key?
An API key is like a password for apps to talk to each other.

For Upwork automation, you need API keys for:
✅ https://t.co/y91On5I38N (to manage workflows)
✅ Apify (to scrape job listings)
✅ OpenAI (ChatGPT) (to filter and personalize proposals)
✅ Google Sheets (to store job data)

2️⃣ How to Get API Keys for Each Service
🔹 https://t.co/y91On5I38N → Settings → API Tokens
🔹 Apify → Settings → API Keys
🔹 OpenAI → API Section → Generate Key
🔹 Google Sheets → Enable API in Google Cloud Console

3️⃣ How to Secure Your API Keys
❌ NEVER share your API key publicly.
❌ NEVER store them in plain text.
✅ Use environment variables or a secure password manager.

Without API keys, automation doesn’t work. Set them up right and unlock the power of AI-driven Upwork lead generation.

💡 Need help setting up API keys? Drop a “🔑” in the comments.
fullText:
You can’t automate anything if you don’t know how to set up API keys.

https://t.co/gvJV9NMOa0, Apify, ChatGPT, and Google Sheets all require API connections.
Mess this up, and your automation won’t work.

Here’s how to set up API keys the right way.

👇 Thread / Post:

1️⃣ What

text:
Q1: How does it work?

How it works in a Nutshell

1. Gather Your Leads:
    
• Scrape Contacts: Use Apollo in combination with Apify to collect contacts. It costs just about $1.20 for every 1,000 leads!

• Filter Right Away: Set filters that match your target audience (this will vary based on what you’re selling).

2. Personalize Your Outreach:

• Enrich & Filter Data: Use tools like Make or Zapier to refine your data.

• Add a Personal Touch: Leverage AI to generate a unique icebreaker for each lead, ensuring your message feels personal and relevant.

3. Send Your Message:

• Feed Into Your Email System: All the enriched data is sent to Instantly.

• Use Proven Copy: Instantly applies a template with compelling copy to get people interested and show why you’re the right person to hire.

This system automates the process from finding the right contacts to delivering a personalized message, making it easier for you to focus on closing the deal.

text:
The response to my 10k-in-14-days comment was amazing! Many of you asked for more details, so here’s a simple blueprint:

1. Find Leads: Use Apollo and Apify to scrape leads that fit your target audience (cost: about $1.20 per 1,000 leads, with a $5 free credit to get started).

2. Enrich Leads: Use https://t.co/N6Jr7JUssQ, Perplexity, and ChatGPT to research each lead and create personalized icebreakers (with 1,000 free operations per month).

3. Email Campaign: Send thousands of emails with compelling copy using Instantly (roughly $50 for 5,000 emails per month).

4. Close Deals: Aim to close 6-7 deals, each worth between $1.5K and $2K.

If you convert just 1% of your leads, you’ll have more customers than you can handle. Tweak and repeat, experiment, and make it work for you!
fullText:
The response to my 10k-in-14-days comment was amazing! Many of you asked for more details, so here’s a simple blueprint:

1. Find Leads: Use Apollo and Apify to scrape leads that fit your target audience (cost: about $1.20 per 1,000 leads, with a $5 free credit to get started).

- Do cold outreach to small artist agents? Find them with Apify's Apollo scraper and send super personalized emails

text:
Free: If you’re okay with manual work, you can start for free using Apify’s $5 free credit to scrape 1,000 leads and manually filter and email them yourself.

$50/month: Use Instantly to handle emails and Make (free for 1,000 operations), allowing you to send 1,000–2,000 emails per month.

$200/month: With this, you can send 10,000+ emails per month using Instantly and Make, making the process more automated.

So, you can start for free with manual effort, $50 for automation on a small scale, or $200 for a larger email outreach.
